channel.title: Blog 7 :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: Introducing Strands Agents 1.0: Production-Ready Multi-Agent Orchestration Made Simple Ryan Coleman and Belle Guttman | 15/07/2025 | Amazon Machine Learning, Announcements, Artificial Intelligence, Open Source| Permalink | Comments Today we are excited to announce version 1.0 of the Strands Agents SDK, marking a significant milestone in our journey to make building AI agents simple, reliable, and production-ready. Strands Agents is an open source SDK that takes a model-driven approach to building and running AI agents in just a few lines of code. Strands scales from simple to complex agent use cases, and from local development to deployment in production.
